item.description:
This is a dog friendly walk, although you do technically have to be a Trustees Green Dog member to bring your dog (I'm a member but have seen lots of others that aren't there with their dogs- so i'll leave it up to you).  I know the main trails, but would like to try some of the side lanes as well...so be comfortable exploring with me.  Some mild gentle sloping hills, but otherwise very nicely mowed, packed grass trails (some dirt in some places).  Plan on doing about 3.5 miles in 1.5 hours.  I have to be back at the cars by 7, so we'll plan accordingly.  Be ready for bugs and ticks- bug spray, long pants, etc.  Look forward to seeing a few of you!

Please note the $1 meetup fee to help Angela pay for the meetup dues
item.how_to_find_us: The main parking lot on GRASS RIDES side (Highland Rd- almost across from back entrance of Bradley Palmer)

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Explore Appleton Farms Grass Rides after work
